kdl.prox.dbvis
Class RadialLayoutHelper

java.lang.Object
  kdl.prox.dbvis.RadialLayoutHelper

public class RadialLayoutHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Static class that helps compute radial layout polar coordinates for Vertices, using the algorithm from this paper: Eades, P., "Drawing Free Trees," Bulletin of the Institute of Combinatorics and its Applications, pp. 10-36, 1992.

Usage: 1) Call computePolarCoordinates(), passing it a startVertex and optional sort key (for unit tests), then pass result to xx() makeVertexLocationFunction() to calculate corresponding Vertex x,y locations based on a canvas size.

Method Detail

computePolarCoordinates

public static java.util.Map computePolarCoordinates(edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.Vertex centerVertex,
                                                    java.util.Comparator vertComparator)
Calculates the polar coordinates (rho and theta) for the radial layout of every Vertex in graph, based on Eades' algorithm (see class docs for ref).

Parameters:
centerVertex - center of the free tree
vertComparator - used by tests to make ordering deterministic. see GraphAsTree
Returns:
Map map of Vertex -> PolarCoordinate pairs that specifies the coordinate of each Vertex found from centerVertex
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if centerVertex's graph is not connected
See Also:
PolarCoordinate

convertPolarToRectangular

public static edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.VertexLocationFunction convertPolarToRectangular(edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.Graph graph,
                                                                                              java.util.Map vertexToPolarCoordMap,
                                                                                              java.awt.Dimension size,
                                                                                              int vertexDiameter)
Converts polar coordinates stored in vertexToPolarCoordMap to rectangular.

Parameters:
graph -
vertexToPolarCoordMap - as returned by computePolarCoordinates()
size - canvas size for conversion
vertexDiameter -
Returns:
a VertexLocationFunction containing rectangular coordinates corresponding to vertexToPolarCoordMap
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any Vertext in graph does not have an entry in vertexToPolarCoordMap

getMaxRho

public static int getMaxRho(java.util.Map vertexToPolarCoordMap)
Returns:
the max Rho of all the polar coordinates for all the vertices in the graph. returns -1 if no polar coordinates found
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any Vertext in graph does not have an entry in vertexToPolarCoordMap

getPolarCoordinate

public static PolarCoordinate getPolarCoordinate(edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.Vertex vertex,
                                                 java.util.Map vertexToPolarCoordMap)
Parameters:
vertex -
vertexToPolarCoordMap - as returned by computePolarCoordinates()
Returns:
the radius (rho) and angle (theta) associated with vertex. returns null if computePolarCoordinates() has not been called
